name: whatsapp-campaign-manager
description: WhatsApp Campaign Manager with Next.js, Express, WAHA, Redis, and PostgreSQL

scripts.db:migrate: docker exec whatsapp-backend npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:studio: docker exec whatsapp-backend npx prisma studio
scripts.db:backup: docker exec whatsapp-postgres pg_dump -U whatsapp_user whatsapp_db > backup.sql
